sentences.en: A handful of onlookers stand in the field watching.
sentences.cn: 少数几个旁观者站在现场观看。

sentences.en: a view of green fields and rolling hills
sentences.cn: 田野青翠、丘陵起伏的景色

sentences.en: Expertly he zigzagged his way across the field, avoiding the deeper gullies.
sentences.cn: 他熟练地左一拐右一拐地绕过深沟，穿过了原野。

sentences.en: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field )
sentences.cn: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来

sentences.en: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field ) .
sentences.cn: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来。

sentences.en: He booted the ball 40 yards back up field.
sentences.cn: 他一脚踢出40码远，把球踢回前场。

sentences.en: He was now to be seen legging it across the field.
sentences.cn: 现在可以看到他快步跑过田地。

sentences.en: He was the fastest thing I ever saw on a baseball field.
sentences.cn: 他是我在棒球场上见过的跑得最快的家伙。

sentences.en: He’s the best-known American outside the field of (= not connected with ) politics.
sentences.cn: 他是政治领域之外最出名的美国人。

sentences.en: Her naked body was found wrapped in a sheet in a field.
sentences.cn: 在田里发现了她的尸体，全身赤裸，裹在一条床单里。

sentences.en: I also conducted a field study among the boys about their attitude to relationships.
sentences.cn: 我也在男生中进行了一项有关他们对人际关系态度的实地调查。

sentences.en: Pete got on his horse and started trotting across the field.
sentences.cn: 皮特跨上马，开始在田野间小跑起来。

sentences.en: Peter’s an expert in his field .
sentences.cn: 彼得是他那个行业里的专家。

sentences.en: The extra field cultivated meant a proportionate increase in work.
sentences.cn: 额外开发土地意味着工作量相应增加。

sentences.en: The leaders came in two minutes clear of the field.
sentences.cn: 优胜者较其他参赛者快两分钟。

sentences.en: the principles of quantum theory hold the field as the convincing account of the physics of the microworld.
sentences.cn: 量子论原理对微观世界物理现象的描述仍然是最令人信服的。

sentences.en: The secondary current sets up a magnetic field inside the tube.
sentences.cn: 二次电流在管子内部会产生磁场。

sentences.en: Three mounted officers rode into the field after the volley.
sentences.cn: 枪炮一起开火后，3名军官骑着马冲进战场。

sentences.en: troops in the field.
sentences.cn: 作战部队。

sentences.en: Two blocks beyond our school was a field where boys played football.
sentences.cn: 离我们学校两个街区远的地方有个男孩们玩橄榄球的球场。

sentences.en: Valerie earned letters in three sports: volleyball, basketball, and field hockey.
sentences.cn: 瓦莱丽在排球、篮球和曲棍球三个项目上获得了佩戴校名首字母标志的荣誉。

sentences.en: We never defeated them on the field of battle.
sentences.cn: 我们从未在战场上打败过他们。

sentences.en: You should rope off a big field and sell tickets.
sentences.cn: 你应该用绳子围起一大片地方来卖票。

words.tran_cn: 保护；担任外场员（field的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 现场应用；野外使用；预涂涂装
n. 实地调查；实地考察
现场试验；实地操作试验
在战场上；在操场上；在田野
出阵，开战：如在军事行动区一项运动中，令其开始或重新开始

trans.tran_en: You use field to describe work or study that is done in a real, natural environment rather than in a theoretical way or in controlled conditions

trans.tran_cn: 田地，运动场，战场，领域，视野，矿田，〈物理〉场，〈计〉字段
trans.tran_en: a subject that people study or an area of activity that they are involved in as part of their work

trans.tran_cn: 防守，成功应对，使参赛，使参加竞选
trans.tran_en: the team that is fielding in a game of  cricket  or baseball is the one that is throwing and catching the ball, rather than the one hitting it
